clip¶

goes_ortho.clip.subsetNetCDF(filepath, bounds, newfilepath=None)¶

Function to crop a GOES ABI netcdf file to lat/lon bounds. Inputs:

  • filepath: path to a netcdf file

  • bounds: list or array containing lat/lon bounds like [min_lat, max_lat, min_lon, max_lon]
